issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

You get into a situation when you use negative positioning (like top: -10) with auto where you're get smaller than intended calculations of the height/width. Need ability to set a floor with 2 new properties: "minHeight", "minWidth"

{html}
fields.summary: iPhone: ability to support minWidth, minHeight when using auto.

comments.body:
{html}

(from [3b8a6356c9edac52bbe548bb11aa91fd6de99e24]) [#1078 state:resolved] added support for minHeight/minWidth for views http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/3b8a6356c9eda...

{html}
